long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Fortnite is the one of the most popular games on recent years. So, we are introducing you Fortnite Animated wallpaper new tab extension to you. Some characters of Fortnite game has been included on this extension. The extension will change your new tab with Fortnite Animated Wallpaper. 

There are also some features included as in our other extensions. The extra features are stated in below. 

- Search bar on the left top pane of the screen (Default search Engine is Google™)
- Notes (You can add notes to your Chrome New Tab to see it future)
- Tasks (You can also assign tasks for yourself and control those tasks on your new tab page)
- Calendar (You can connect your Google™ Calendar)

Note: You can uninstall the extension whenever you want to do. To uninstall it right click the icon on the right top of your browser and select "Remove from Chrome..." If you could provide feedback for us why you have uninstalled the extension. It is appreciated at our side.
